parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Index of the line where the index begins at 0

title: ISFSymbol.GetLineAtIndex
description: Gets information for the specified line.

parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Index of the line where the index begins at 0

remarks:
Call
ISFSymbol::GetLineCount
before calling this method to get the number of lines in this surface finish symbol.
The return value is the following array of doubles :
[
lineType
,
startPt
[3],
endPt
[3]
]
where:
lineType
= Line type as defined in
swLineTypes_e
startPt
[3]
= XYZ line start point
endPt
[3]
= XYZ line end point
